Castle Grounds.name: Castle Grounds
Castle Grounds.description: The castle grounds is normally loud and full of people, but today it looks empty...

Pantry.name: Pantry
Pantry.description: The pantry is a small, open area with tables and a few chairs.

Time Portal.name: Time Portal
Time Portal.description:
Whatever this room was before, is now gone. All that remains is the portal back to your time
- but you can't go back until you have the blood sample!

Kitchen.name: Kitchen
Kitchen.description: The Kitchen is a room for food preparation and cooking. It can serve as a hideout and provide storage for weapons.

Ballroom.name: Ballroom
Ballroom.description: The Ball Room is a large formal room inside a building for holding large parties called balls.

Dining Room.name: Dining Room
Dining Room.description: The Dining Room is used for eating meals. Other activities such playing board games may also take place in the dining room.

Armory.name: Armory
Armory.description: An Armory is a supply of arms for defending and attacking. It can also be a place where arms are manufactured. It is a well guarded place.

Great Hall.name: Great Hall
Great Hall.description: The Great Hall is the main room in the house. It serves as a safe place for groups to retreat to in times of danger.

Hallway.name: Hallway
Hallway.description: The Hallway is the area of the house that connect the bedrooms.

Bed Chamber I.name: Bed Chamber I
Bed Chamber I.description: The Bed Chamber is used for sleeping, resting and healing.

Bed Chamber II.name: Bed Chamber II
Bed Chamber II.description: The Bed Chamber is used for sleeping, resting and healing.

Bed Chamber III.name: Bed Chamber III
Bed Chamber III.description: The Bed Chamber is used for sleeping, resting and healing.

Garden.name: Garden
Garden.description: The Garden is a large open area with bright flowers and a fountain. It is a place to relax and enjoy the sun.

Throne Room.name: Throne Room
Throne Room.description: The Throne Room is a large room with a throne in the center. It is used for the king to sit and rule the land.

Parapet.name: Parapet
Parapet.description: The Parapet is a large tower with a large gate in the center. It is used for protecting the castle from the outside.

Stable.name: Stable
Stable.description: The Stable is a large room with a stable in the center. It is used for the stable master to keep the animals in.
